message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 split seems fair.
I appreciate your offer, but I think we can do better. Let's try a 60/40 split in my favor this time.  After all, I am the one making the offer this round.
Bob, let's be realistic. We're losing money with each round. I'm proposing a 55/45 split. Take it or leave it.
